name: TaxAct 2016 Tax Return Backup File
summary: A BA6 file is a backup file of a 2016 tax return created with the 2016 version of TaxAct, a tax-preparation program. It contains tax data for the 2016 tax year, which is used for archival purposes and in case the .TA6 file is lost or becomes corrupt. BA6 files include federal IRS and state tax form data along with the user's basic information.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
